# Preflower Use

A monorepo for self that save my work accumulation.

## Documentation

- [Introduction](/use/)
- [Utils](/use/packages/utils/)
- [Vue Use](/use/packages/vue-use/)

## Packages

- [Function - idempotent](/use/packages/utils/function/idempotent)
- [Object - defineMap](/use/packages/utils/object/define-map)
- [Object - toRawType](/use/packages/utils/object/to-raw-type)
- [Object - pick](/use/packages/utils/object/pick)
- [Screen - returnIsRotationFunction](/use/packages/utils/screen/return-is-rotation-function)
